sentence.Network_en: The tough mountaineer succeeded in getting to the top of the mountain.

sentence.Network_en: Tilman was a famous explorer, mountaineer, sailor and writer.

sentence.Network_en: He told us some hair - raising stories about his exploits as a mountaineer.

entry.def: A mountaineer is a person who is skilful at climbing the steep sides of mountains.

means.word_mean: 1. climb mountains for pleasure as a sport
